== Two parts : ==
A part for the customers interested for the properties :
users features :
3 kinds of users :
sellers, buyers, estate agents.
Buyers : 
- view a properties
- Ask for a visit, appointment
- Browse and list properties
- Make an offer
- Create a user account
- Manage profile
- Consult interest list (sum up of the properties the buyer is interested in, like a basket).
- Notification for concurrent offers for the properties in the interest list(email).

Optional features : 
- 

Sellers : 
- Create a user account
- Manage profile
- Advertise a property
- Edit the properties profiles (description, pictures, dates of availability) 
- Manage properties
- Consult the offers made on his properties and must be able to contact the concerned buyers.

Estate Agents:
- Verify and validate the added properties
- Give an agreement for the visits required by the buyers.
- Contact buyers and sellers
- When a property is created, it is assigned to the estate agent.
- Manage properties



An administrative part for managing the properties in the agency
